p: All bacterial strains used in this study are listed in Supplementary Table S1. All experiments were performed in lysogeny broth (LB) medium (tryptone: 10 g/L, yeast extract: 5 g/L, NaCl: 5 g/L). Where applicable, the growth medium was supplemented with ampicillin (100 µg/ml) and/or chloramphenicol (25 µg/ml).
